website_summaries.verdict: Great for using to warm office, nursery, or bedroom, as long as you can tolerate the beep every time you change settings.
pros: Choice of low, high or fan-only settings
LED display shows the current room temperature and lets you control the adjustable thermostat
Timer lets you run from 1-10 hours
Digital controls let you set exact temperature
cons: Loud beep when you change settings disturb some during nighttime use

customer_reviews.title: Heats a small space quickly.
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd Pelonis heater. My second purchase wasn't a replacement, but was an additional heater for a different living area. I purchased my first Pelonis heater about 3 years ago for my bedroom, so I could just take the chill off before heading off to work without having to heat the whole house. My second purchase was for my dining room. This room has lots of windows, so my little heater keeps the area way from the heat vents more comfortable for my guests from the South who find some of our entertaining cooler than they are used to. It is easy to set the settings to the desired temperature.
customer_reviews.author: Cozy in Seattle

customer_reviews.title: Heats well. Great timer. Great fall over safety feature. 1 out of 3 has to be returned due to some unsafe issues.
customer_reviews.text: Love the turn off and turn on timer. Warms a master bedroom very well. However there is always a batch that is bad. I've bought 6 and 3 had issues. The plug melts the wall socket or turning it on for the first time gave off and bad smell with smoke. I usually only set the timer to be on for 1hr so there are no outlet melting hazards. It is sensitive for when it is barely bumped, and will turn off. Good feature. Even though it's has its issues, I will continue to buy this. When u get one that operates well, it makes for a great heater
customer_reviews.author: Flutterbygrl

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: it works fine so far but figuring out the controls is very confusing, especially at first.
customer_reviews.author: rick cettolin

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Heater!
customer_reviews.text: I have several of these heaters for various uses. I love the temperature control. I use these for personal heat wherever I need it. RV, bedrooms, bathrooms, and as a personal space heater. Instead of running the heat for the whole house and heating rooms that are not used much, I use this Pelonis. It is so nice to count on a temperature for a room when you walk in and have that work!
customer_reviews.author: Dee Dee

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Had one for years..that one stop working so just got a replacement, because I've always use this brand when it comes to heaters never had a problem with it..plus got it on sale so it was a win for me !!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Saget

customer_reviews.title: Does it’s job.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a bit tricky to set. Make sure you press mode button unti it says “fan” or it will stay on heat. I bought it to use in bath room. I have a spin dryer that almost gets clothes dry. With this fan blowing in bath room it takes less than an hour to get clothes completely dry. That being said I did not buy it for a heater. I really should have bought just a fan for what I need. Heater does work but It did cut off even when set to 75.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette

customer_reviews.title: Bad features
customer_reviews.text: It will heat the room but annoying noisy button press wakes up everyone it in the room. Every button press beeps LOUDLY, then when you turn it off, it counts down from 12 before it actually goes off! When I turn something off, I want it off immediately, not 12 seconds later. It’s horrible. Very good output though, but annoying features.
customer_reviews.author: MA

customer_reviews.title: Keep it at 90
customer_reviews.text: The temperature control on this thing does not work. I can turn it on and have it set at around 75 and it will run for 10 seconds and then turn the cooling fan on for 15. Meanwhile, it's a nice cold morning here and most certainly not 75 degrees. This thing is a frustrating joke, I wish I had returned it when I had the chance.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this little heater
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this little heater. It can easily heat a regular-sized room with an oscillating fan and heater coil combination. But, best of all is the digital thermostat that is the easiest thing in the world to set and forget. It even has features that I haven't even explored yet, like the timer features for turning it on and off automatically based upon the hours, as well! And, you'll never beat this price!
customer_reviews.author: Gr Ha

customer_reviews.title: Need Instructions
customer_reviews.text: It didnt come with instructions it would heat up for a few then cold fan come on then shuts off some time timer comes on very confusing with out instruction but I can tell this will be a very good heater heats up very nice
customer_reviews.author: EVE

customer_reviews.title: PELONIS Os cillating Digital Fan Heater
customer_reviews.text: I love this heater. I use it in my bathroom. My old one finally died after years of service and I was happy to find this model on Amazon after not seeing it on the PELONIS website. I think I am going to purchase another one.
customer_reviews.author: JNPDX

customer_reviews.title: Fan heater that looks nice and does its job
customer_reviews.text: Fan heaters are in general quite practical, but not too powerful. This is not the exception. However, in my experience most are prone to problems, and this has worked well even under intensive use. Plus, it looks very nice, with a more sophisticated appearance than most others.
customer_reviews.author: Avila

customer_reviews.title: Ok for a small room. Not a high efficiency heater.  Basic wire heating element.
customer_reviews.text: This is basically a fancy small "milk house" heater, but better. For $19.99 it was still a bargain. Most of the electric heaters I have have ceramic elements which are more efficient. The heating element is just wire, probably Nichrome or a similar high resistance alloy metal. Ok for a small room. I do like the fact that it is digital and after you set the desired temperature it shows the current room temperature while it's heating.
customer_reviews.author: sbfoster777

customer_reviews.title: It is perfect for personal use and for smaller areas
customer_reviews.text: I love space heater. I can't live without it. This one is good. Gives you instant heat right when you need it. But can rise up your electricity bills. Other important thing is , this item is not for large room or for many people but it's working fine for a small area.
customer_reviews.author: S. Bhatt

customer_reviews.title: Best one we've had so far
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect for a 200 square-foot room. Keep temperature pretty well according to baby monitor temperature gauge. Way more predictable temperature than analog dial style thermostat.
customer_reviews.author: particular customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy something else!
customer_reviews.text: This product is garbage! It works for 2 seconds of heat and then it just shuts off flashing the supposed temperature. I will never order this junk product again, waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: D. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Some good, somebad!
customer_reviews.text: Thermostat is not accurate. Instructions are not well written, HEATING is excellent. Thermostat control just doesn’t work properly.
customer_reviews.author: SC Golfer

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money
customer_reviews.text: Small but very sturdy and great value for your money. Better for “knocking off the chill “ in a room. It does heat up small place quickly.
customer_reviews.author: S. Champion

customer_reviews.title: Great Unit
customer_reviews.text: I had the same type of heater a few years earlier but it shorted when the cat puked on it. I purchased this as the replacement since the previous one did so well. I have no complaints to note about this heater.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron S.

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Read the directions. It’s a little more complicated that some, but easy to use once you read the directions.
customer_reviews.author: Margi Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Heater!
customer_reviews.text: I love this heater! It's very well designed and although it's small, it packs a punch and does a good job spot-heating my chilly basement when I'm working down there or guests stay over.
customer_reviews.author: bettiola

customer_reviews.title: Powerful in a small package
customer_reviews.text: Although it's a small heater it heats up a room quickly. I love the timer and oscillating function on it. It doesn't have the traditional on/off switch so it was a bit complicated for my co-worker to turn off. Otherwise, it was well worth the investment and I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. B

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: No complaints and really like the temperature control settings where you can set it for a particular temp.
customer_reviews.author: Nineweh

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but check thermostat setting.
customer_reviews.text: Since this product has an internal thermostat, it tends to shut off when the room temperature is lower than the temperature at the thermostat. I calibrate mine using an accurate thermometer well separated from the heater.
customer_reviews.author: Harry Riead

customer_reviews.title: Great little heater
customer_reviews.text: Great little heater. Heats up about a 1000 sq feet within 15 minutes and it is silent and rotates warm air throughout the room. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ashbriana

customer_reviews.title: Good for Smaller areas
customer_reviews.text: Product is good in terms of money paid for it. Good for a smaller area
customer_reviews.author: Tushar

customer_reviews.title: Best quality at a bad ass price!
customer_reviews.text: Love the heating modes! Its very easy and works great!
customer_reviews.author: april

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to turn on.
customer_reviews.text: I have a hard time turning on the unit. Short press? Long press? Hard press? I don’t know. I think something is wrong with the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Troy R.

customer_reviews.title: heats up my whole place
customer_reviews.text: excellent heater, came fast, good service, love this little heater an i can store it anywhere
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely an open box
customer_reviews.text: The heater works as expected (this is my second one from Pelonis), but the heater came in a beat up box, missing tape to secure it, and the contents were haphazardly put together. I have nothing against purchasing open box items, but it is misleading to not label it as such.
customer_reviews.author: Thadeus McGee

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after about 6 weeks of non-continuous use!
customer_reviews.text: It was a little tricky figuring out how to use at first, but after I got the hang of it it was fine. Unfortunately stopped working correctly after about 6 weeks, and I hadn't used it all that much. It was great before it broke :-/
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey W.

customer_reviews.title: Glorified Foot Warmer
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the unit to heat my small home office. It does not efficiently heat the space and needs to be about 5 inches from my feet on the highest setting in order to keep them warm.
customer_reviews.author: Mersadie

customer_reviews.title: small unit puts out great heat!
customer_reviews.text: Don't like that upon changing temp, the unit beeps. Also have to change temp often, it seems to keep the temp even.
customer_reviews.author: Eve M.

customer_reviews.title: its working fine until now
customer_reviews.text: I got this yesterday. its working fine until now. Initially i got some wires burning smell when i started it, but later some time its not. Fine until now.. Will update if any issue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: and perfect for a small room
customer_reviews.text: PROS: It is small, and perfect for a small room. CONS: If you set a temp. it just stops when that temp is reached.
customer_reviews.author: Howard Hoskins

customer_reviews.title: Trusted
customer_reviews.text: Works well, trusted to heat throughout the cold nights.Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: susan priest

customer_reviews.title: Second time buying!
customer_reviews.text: This heater is amazing! My last one lasted me 3 1/2 years and I frequently used it... even in the summer! Happily repurchased!
customer_reviews.author: Aya Bun

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love my Pelonis. We had an earlier model of this heater (6 years) and it died so....
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Best thing ever!
customer_reviews.text: It’s just perfect! Warms up my room in an instant !
customer_reviews.author: Chaotic allure

customer_reviews.title: Heats well in a small room
customer_reviews.text: Great product and valuable as well. No worries about the cold just wear the way you like 👯‍♀️👭👍
customer_reviews.author: Junior

customer_reviews.title: No.
customer_reviews.text: Total piece of junk - useful for heating a small closet
customer_reviews.author: kferg

customer_reviews.title: PIECE OF GARBAGE!
customer_reviews.text: Total piece of JUNK! it broke on me after 1 week of use! Dont waste your money like i did!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dakota Softpaw

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: It is compact and it works great! I also came in a timely manner.
customer_reviews.author: Toni McKinley

customer_reviews.title: Safety hazard.. won't order it again !
customer_reviews.text: It sparked after I turned it on and started smoking the very first time I tried to use it
customer_reviews.author: Tia

customer_reviews.title: it works wonderful and we have one i think is about ten ...
customer_reviews.text: Yes,it works wonderful and we have one i think is about ten yrs old that still works,a very sound product......
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heater
customer_reviews.text: This is a great heater. I only buy this brand of heaters as its the best in my opionion 👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Tia

customer_reviews.title: Worked long enough for me to lose the directions.  Now completely dead!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this fan as i have had a Pelonis in the past and loved it. Well this one worked long enough for me to through the box out and lose the directions. It is completely dead and this, in my estimation was not cheep. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Miller

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Confusing settings. Cant get to go on at reaching a set temperature, which is why I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thermostat never worked
customer_reviews.text: Just got this heater & it's terrible. The heat just stays on low/high constantly, just like the heater in your car. The thermostat part doesn't turn it off when the room temperature is warmer than the set/desired temp. I tried product registration on the Midea America website with my phone/laptop and it won't send the Email. Tried to email customer support through their website and it didn't work, either. Hopefully actually sending an email to their customer service email address address goes through and I can get a replacement /refund
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Hot and Ready
customer_reviews.text: I love this heater. I've owned this style of heater for many years and its been reliable. Buying another one because it's so great!! I appreciate that the heater gets warm fast, it can oscillate, and it doesn't smell weird. It's also nice that it works as a fan. Only complaint is that I wish that it didn't beep so loud when you press buttons on it. Edit: the main middle button broke after less than a month of owning it; amazon was able to get me a replacement
customer_reviews.author: H.

customer_reviews.title: Great but annoyingly loud beep.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this little guy for the bedroom. Works great to warm it up a bit or just run the fan for the noise. Biggest drawback is the beeping noise when making any adjustment. It is SO loud. It literally startled me when I plugged it in the first time. Change the temp one degree? BEEEEEEP!!!!! Change the heat setting? BEEEEEEEEEEEP!!!! Turn it off? BEEEEEEEP!!!! Unplug it from the wall? *silence.... plug it back in? BEEEEEEEP! I won’t buy another one for this reason. If I find a way to make it not beep I’ll update you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love the digital part and that is turns on to ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a quick way to heat up bathroom for my baby when bathing instead of heating up the whole house and burning up in the process. I love the digital part and that is turns on to maintain the set temperature. Don't like the beeping noise it makes when turning on because sometimes I put it in baby room in middle of night to knock off chill while baby is sleeping and don't want the beep to wake him up. Other than that it's great and I can deal with a beep here and there for the quality that this fan offers!
customer_reviews.author: Lithesha H

customer_reviews.title: Does Its Job!
customer_reviews.text: I love this compact heater. I had an earlier model of this heater that lasted 12 years then it gave out. This model is an updated version. Almost the same features. Very good for small. Really portable. Heats up a small space fast. Has a handy timer on it. Very sturdy & well made. Very practical and worth the price. The only feature that I don't use is the oscillating feature.
customer_reviews.author: Lily Flowers

customer_reviews.title: Good heater
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice heater. I love that you can set it for a time to come on. I use it in my living room because it's such an open space. I know that the overheating shutoff switch is for safety, but it drives me nuts when I want the heater on my feet. When the surrounding temperature matches the temp you have it set for, the heater basically takes a pause until the temp goes back down.
customer_reviews.author: Chantle

customer_reviews.title: Hate the Loud Beeping!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it. Tried it. Returning it. The loud beeping sound every time you push a button is annoying and there's no silent option. It was ineffective quickly warming my bathroom compared to prior heaters. I also don't like that it blows cold air for 15 seconds after you've turned it off. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: J. Billings

customer_reviews.title: Big mistake.
customer_reviews.text: This heater was purchased for our 5th wheel to help take the chill off at night. It lasted 3 hours into the first night then started smoking. Since we were on the road and away from home for a month we couldn't return it as it would be past the month. So no I wouldn't recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: snappymik

customer_reviews.title: Great little heater!
customer_reviews.text: Love this heater. Using at work under desk. Like that it has a tip feature since using in an office setting. Have used every day since I purchased. Has some noise when running, but I've had alot worse.
customer_reviews.author: Hurshy Cat

customer_reviews.title: Good value, nice heater.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice heater thermometer is not quite accurate it will heat up a small room with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: BAW

customer_reviews.title: Too complicated
customer_reviews.text: I am a big fan of Pelonis heaters, but this one was a disappointment. The controls simply cannot be used unless you have read and memorized the functions in the user manual. That is not a game changer, but if someone else needs to turn it on, it is virtually impossible.
customer_reviews.author: JerryS

customer_reviews.title: not a good heater
customer_reviews.text: I have a very small bathroom and this heater simply did not heat the room even to a minimum. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Monica S.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent condition and works well
customer_reviews.text: I wish it could hang it there for a longer time. It heats very quickly and turns off pretty fast. So intermittently you have to deal with cold intervals.
customer_reviews.author: Sunita Singh

customer_reviews.title: Repeat customer!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time purchasing a Pelonis digital fan forced heater. My 1st lasted about 5 years. It works great, the only thing that would make it better is if it came with a remote! 😁
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Marcela

customer_reviews.title: An efficient little heater
customer_reviews.text: This will warm-up a room in no time! Very quiet - and very effective!
customer_reviews.author: T. Young

customer_reviews.title: Great little heater
customer_reviews.text: I put this in my camper for a little help on cold nights. It does a great job for its size. Really like the thermostat on it.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Really Good Fan Heater.
customer_reviews.text: Best Fan! I own two - one for my home and one at my job.
customer_reviews.author: ReneJunito

customer_reviews.title: Stay Warm!
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding little heating. My original heater is still going strong- 2 years later and is used A LOT>
customer_reviews.author: Wiser One

customer_reviews.title: Love this brand of heater
customer_reviews.text: Love this brand of heater. Had one before. Like how it turns off when it hits the temperature set. Great safety feature
customer_reviews.author: Trisha Sanderson

customer_reviews.title: It's work well for us.
customer_reviews.text: We have this little heater at home. We love it so much,. We order another 2 .
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Powerful - heats up the room quickly
customer_reviews.text: Not too noisy. The only thing I would do to improve would be a remote.
customer_reviews.author: Bird Feeder

customer_reviews.title: Too much focus on safety
customer_reviews.text: Won’t stay in. Too many safety controls. Older models better.
customer_reviews.author: R. Sizemore

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Used to keep detached bathroom from freezing. So far works well.
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: Pelonis 1,500-watt heater is the bomb!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty neat and versatile little heater. Also light weight, with the base being the heaviest part not easily knocked over. Instructions fairly easy to understand.
customer_reviews.author: James A. Bailey

customer_reviews.title: VERY loud and VERY annoying. Not necessary
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this heater because the reviews indicated it was quiet. It's ok but not nearly as quiet as an older heater we have that's no longer available. Biggest complaint is the loud beep when you plug it in or change settings. VERY loud and VERY annoying. Not necessary, wish I could figure out how to disconnect the beeper. Nice air quantity.
customer_reviews.author: akm

product_meta.title: PELONIS Oscillating Digital Fan Heater
product_meta.description:
Pelonis Digital Fan Forced Electric Portable Heater with 1500W Fast Heating, Over-heating Protection, Tip-over Switch, Oscillation, Digital LED Display, Heater & Fan in One Features. Black Product description (optional) : 

More Durable and Reliable Warmth from Pelonis Portable Digital Control and LED Display Fan Forced Heater

Electric fan heaters deliver instant and directional warmth.Ideal for small to medium room, it heats up fast and delivers wide range of heating air supply.

The Pelonis innovative and ultra-wide energy-saving heating element can give out heat in large area., and with the ultra-high heat efficiency, it can improve the indoor temperature in a short time.

Features of the Pelonis Portable Digital Control and LED Display Fan Forced Heater

 * Built-in adjustable thermostat to maintain your desired temperature
 * Digital LED display for easy control and shows the current room temperature
 * 3 seconds fast heating and over-heating protection 
 * 3 settings: High (1500 Watts), Low (900 Watts) and Fan Only
 * Over-heating protection and Tip-over switch protection
 * Deliver warmth to a large scope (107 sq.ft) 
 * Easy control operation and easy to move and carry with carry handle design 

Product Specifications:

 * Maximum Energy Usage: 1500 Watts
 * Dimension: 9.17 (L)* 6.85 (W)* 11.73 (H) inch
 * Gross Weight: 4.45 lb
 * MAX NOISE:55 dB 

Package including：

 * 1* Fan Heater 
 * 1* User manual 

Warm Prompt

The warning on the package box was required by California Proposition 65. This Pelonis electric heater is ETL certificated and all the materials we used are safe.
feature_bullets: Fast Heating and Constant Temperature - Fan heaters are, typically, the most effective type of electric-resistance radiant heaters. Quickly heat-up to 70°F in 3 second with reliable ceramic heating technology, offering steady comfortable temperature.

Digital Control and Display - Built-in, adjustable thermostat to maintain your desired temperature. The digital LED display shows the current room temperature and lets you control the adjustable thermostat. Affordable electric heater.

Heater & Fan Multi Functions - This multifuction electric heater with 2 heating options (High, Low ). Turn to Fan Only function make this heater as a personal fan in Summer. Easy to control the speed of the fan. Heater & Fan in One, utility appliance.

Safe to Use - The electric fan heater made of cool touch and high quality flame resistant material. US standard socket can directly plug into an outlet without any adapter or extension cord. Overheating protection ensure safe use.

User Friendly Heater - Easy control panel, carry handle, full assembled are features of the quiet electric heaters. 100 sq. ft. heating area capacity is ideal for a small room. Perfect fast heating heater for your bed room, living room, office,etc.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars301 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
